message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This is a very fair price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about we try $9,500?
